featured.text: Later, in the medieval Islamic Caliphate, a form of passport was the bara’a, a receipt for taxes paid.
Only people who paid their taxes were permitted to travel to different regions of the Caliphate.

definition.zh_def: 一種提供乘客運輸服務的車輛，通常按計程表收費。
definition.en_def: A vehicle that provides transportation services for passengers, usually charging by a meter.
definition.example: We took a taxi to the airport to catch our flight.
